Package dao

Interface CountriesDAO

All Known Implementing Classes:
CountriesDAOImpl
public interface CountriesDAO
This is the CountriesDAO interface. This interface defines the methods that are implemented by the CountriesDAOImpl class.

  • Method Details

    • getAllCountries

      javafx.collections.ObservableList<Countries> getAllCountries()
      This is the getAllCountries method. This method searches the database for any and all countries and then adds them to an observable list called allCountries.
      Returns:

    • getCountry

      Countries getCountry(int countryID)
      This is the getCountry method. This method searches the database for any and all country records that match the given parameter which is country ID.

    • modifyCountry

      int modifyCountry(int countryID, String currentCountryName, String newCountryName)
      This is the modifyCountry method. This method searches the database for previously entered records that match the country ID and country name parameters. It then updates the name via the newCountryName field.
      Parameters:
      countryID -
      currentCountryName -
      newCountryName -

      int deleteCountry(int countryID, String countryName)
      This is the deleteCountry method. This method searches the database via countryID and countryName parameters and then allows the user to remove the specified records from the database.
